summary: THE POWER STEERING INTERMITTENTLY GOES OUT BEFORE PUTTING THE CAR IN MOTION WITH THE STEERING WHEEL LOCKING AND THE ERROR LIGHT DISPLAYS BUT AFTER TURNING OFF THE CAR AND RESTARTING THE WHEEL WOULD UNLOCK. IT HAS ALSO LOST POWER STEERING WHILE DRIVING AT A SPEED OF 45MPH WHICH MADE IT EXTREMELY DIFFICULT TO TURN.
